Speaker: Henry
Text: I've completed it. My magnum opus. The Carmen to my Bizet. My Claire de Lune.

Next.Speaker: Henry
Next.Text: All this modern musical malarky is rotting your brain. I listened to that... Spotify fellow the other day. Terrible arrangement... he didn't include a single aria.

Next.Speaker: Alex
Next.Text: Yeah. Spotify's last album was definitely overrated.
